external_games.name: Tomb Raider: The Tower Bridge Experience

name: Tomb Raider: The Tower Bridge Experience
storyline: It is Winston's birthday tomorrow and Lara forgot to get him the present he wanted. Lara quickly jumps out of bed and rings the shop to find that they were unfortunately closed for the day. Not one to be deterred by opening hours, she packs her gear and sneaks out of Croft Manor.
summary:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the TombEngine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This level started as a training ground and experimental ground for the author to get back into level building, and push the new TombEngine to its limits. As part of Matrix54's Revival Challenge he decided to pay homage to the late Dhama's Tower Bridge levels created in 2001. As a test he attempted to create Tower Bridge in Tomb Raider with its proper dimensions, a feat wouldn't be possible before TEN (TombEngine). And it just grew from there!
